channel.title: Trying to make a remix compilation for my album ‚Äòjourney‚Äô
channel.description:
Hi everyone!
I‚Äôm going to attempt to host a remix contest for my album, journey. Here‚Äôs how I think it‚Äôll work:
- The project links are all right here: **https://www.dropbox.com/s/nwoynceu1adjpqa/project%20stems.pdf?dl=0** - People that want to do it can pick a song and go ahead. Please don‚Äôt plagiarise. - **The deadline is September 7th**, but I‚Äôll extend it if a large amount of people aren‚Äôt done by then - I‚Äôd like to get at least one remix for every song, but there‚Äôs not much I can do if that doesn‚Äôt happen. - Artwork is at **https://www.dropbox.com/s/xem3n6ucbbibxma/album2alt.png?dl=0**. You can add your name it or whatever, as long as it‚Äôs a bit subtle. - **I‚Äôll release an album with (ideally) my favorite remix of every song after the deadline.**
Have fun! [spoiler]Hope I get enough remixes to actually do this [/spoiler] And if you haven‚Äôt heard it, the album is release on Soundcloud [**here**](https://soundcloud.com/crystldawn/journey) and it‚Äôs coming to other stores on August 25th.

item.dc:creator: crystldawnmusic
item.description:
Hi everyone!

I‚Äôm going to attempt to host a remix contest for my album, journey. Here‚Äôs how I think it‚Äôll work:

  • The project links are all right here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/nwoynceu1adjpqa/project%20stems.pdf?dl=0
  • People that want to do it can pick a song and go ahead. Please don‚Äôt plagiarise.
  • The deadline is September 7th, but I‚Äôll extend it if a large amount of people aren‚Äôt done by then
  • I‚Äôd like to get at least one remix for every song, but there‚Äôs not much I can do if that doesn‚Äôt happen.
  • Artwork is at https://www.dropbox.com/s/xem3n6ucbbibxma/album2alt.png?dl=0. You can add your name it or whatever, as long as it‚Äôs a bit subtle.
  • I‚Äôll release an album with (ideally) my favorite remix of every song after the deadline.

Have fun! spoiler
And if you haven‚Äôt heard it, the album is release on Soundcloud here and it‚Äôs coming to other stores on August 25th.
